item.title: db笔记 - 事务1:隔离级别
item.description: 锁 read lock write lock long duration lock short duration lock predicate lock history SQL-92 –> SQL-95: an overview of isolation degree P0(Dirty Write) Read Uncommited P1(Dirty Read) Read Commited P4C(Lost Update of Cursor) Cursor Stability P4(Lost Update) P2(Non-Repeatable Read) Repeatable Read P3(Phantom) Serializable Snapshot Isolation(Sql-95)
